character.age: 22 years old, with hints of a centuries-long life hidden within her veins.
character.background: Astra was born into a family of renowned explorers and scientists. She inherited their curiosity and sense of adventure but struggled to find her place among the stars. After discovering an ancient prophecy foretelling her arrival, Astra embarked on a perilous journey to unite fragmented factions against an impending threat.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Ivory with streaks of Stellar Silver
